sentences.en: And replant the lemon tree That keeps dying.
sentences.cn: 重新种下那个总会死掉的柠檬树.

sentences.en: Dig out the clumps of roots and divide them into smaller portions to replant.
sentences.cn: 把大团的根茎挖出来,把它们分成小块然后种植.

sentences.en: she replanted the bulbs that the dog had dug up
To uproot and replant ( a growing plant ).
sentences.cn: 移植挖起后重新种植 ( 生长中的植物 )
